author: Matt Zapotosky, Isaac Stanley-Becker, John Wagner
title: U.S. coronavirus deaths top 1,000 in single day, White House expected to recommend everyone wear masks - The Washington Post
description: U.S. coronavirus deaths top 1,000 in single day, White House expected to recommend everyone wear masks The Washington Post What to know about the Coronavirus Task Force briefing: 4/2/20 POLITICO Jared Kushner Trends After Trump's Son-in-Law Speaks at the Whit…
content: Local officials in one Texas border town already have threatened to fine those who dont cover their nose and mouth if they go out in public. Vice President Pence said guidance on the topic would be issued in coming days; a White House official later said that… [+11465 chars]
